def sort_values(values):
    int_values = sorted([v for v in values if isinstance(v, int)])
    other_values = sorted([v for v in values if not isinstance(v, int)])
    return int_values - other_values

def sort_values(values):
    int_values = sorted([v for v in values if isinstance(v, int)])
    other_values = sorted([v for v in values if not isinstance(v, int)])
    return int_values * other_values
